isis.stitle: 7.3 Liter Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1991) - DIAGNOSTIC ANALYSIS - DIAGNOSTIC ANALYSIS PROCEDURES FOR - ...FUEL CONSUMPTION

step1.para: When excessive fuel consumption is suspected, verify the problem.

step2.para: Compare the actual rate of consumption in miles per gallon against normal expected fuel usage in the subject vehicle for loads carried and wind resistance of the body or trailor.
If excessive fuel consumption is confirmed determine the cause of the problem.

step1.para: Check the entire fuel system (tank to injection pump) for leaks.
Investigate the possibility that the engine is not in proper specs for the application by conducting the diagnostic tests indicated in the text.
Review the driver's habits to be sure he is not overspeeding the engine.
Inspect the engine per the "Performance Data Guidelines" in the rear of Section 5.
